item.title: Outside 6 Cleve Road, 1st October
item.description:
A sink hole appeared approximately 6 weeks ago with a constant puddle of water inside. I noticed it in July as vehicles passing over it would splash nearby parked cars/people. As time has gone by and the problem has not been resolved it looks much worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Cleve Road, South Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More fly tipping outside Bermondsey Arts Club, Tower Bridge Road., 1st October
item.description:
Mattress has been moved from outside Barclays Bank to outside Bermondsey Arts Club 102a Tower Bridge Road for some inexplicable reason. Perhaps people now consider that this is the perfect place to abandon their junk with no repercussions. Please deal with this ongoing problem in a more permanent way rather than dealing with each case as it happens because it’s becoming truly unacceptable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grange Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The boundary hedge of Alexandra Recreation Ground, Penge, fronting Lennard Rd, between Maitland and Alexandra roads, needs cutting back to the chain link fence and fence posts line., 1st October
item.description:
The boundary hedge of Alexandra Recreation Ground, Penge, fronting Lennard Rd, between Maitland and Alexandra roads, needs cutting back to the chain link fence and fence posts line. It is extending around 0.5m (1 and a half feet) over the narrow footway. On the other side is permissive two wheel footway parking on the fast narrow, double side parked road. The limited space from both incursions makes it difficult for pedestrians, including myself with mobility difficulties, those with wheelchairs, prams, sight problems etc to use the footway. About this time of the year hedges stop growing so cutting back should last until spring. Please cut back the full height of the overhang eg. I am 6 foot 2 inches in shoes and have more height with an umbrella. NB there is no Park and Green space option for Park boundary hedges so I am reporting it here. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lennard Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Piles of vomit and urine, 1st October
item.description:
Alcove in rear corner of Sainsburys where Pitfield Street meets Charles Sq attracts people who aren’t always in a good way. There are now large piles of vomit on the pavement every week and large pools of urine. The area unsurprisingly stinks when you pass
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charles Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
